entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 near Haro Strait in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
